Package gui.menuActions

Class Summary
AboutMenuAction Action that happens when user clicks about menu item.
DisconnectAction Action that happens when the user disconnect from a game.
HelpMenuAction Action that happens when user clicks help menu item.
HostGameAction Action that happens when the user hosts a game.
JoinGameAction Action that happens when the user join a game.
MenuAction Abstract action class.
NewGameMenuAction Action that happens when user clicks new game menu item.
QuitMenuAction Action that happens when user clicks quit menu item.
SettingsMenuAction Action that happens when user clicks settings menu item.
StartGameAction Action that happens when the user presses ready on the lobby view.
